titles.title: Tennessee Wilderness Act of 2011
Tennessee Wilderness Act of 2011
A bill to designate as wilderness certain public land in the Cherokee National Forest in the State of Tennessee, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 112-226.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman under authority of the order of the Senate of 12/17/2011 without amendment. With written report No. 112-123.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 285.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 1/13/2012--Reported to Senate without amendment. Tennessee Wilderness Act of 2011 - Designates specified federal lands in Cherokee National Forest in Tennessee as wilderness and as additions to the National Wilderness Preservation System (NWPS).
